about_the_game:
📖 Discover the art and secrets behind the love in the dungeon.

Explore the creative process and details that brought DUNGEON OF LOVE to life with this 60-page artbook, filled with illustrations, concepts, and development anecdotes. Perfect for fans of the game and visual art lovers.

🌟 WHAT’S INCLUDED IN THIS ARTBOOK?

🎨 Concept Art Section:
More than 32 concept illustrations, from early character designs to potato-shaped monsters. Discover how the game’s art evolved.

📚 Curiosities Section:
Exclusive anecdotes about the development, the origin of the idea, and unique moments from the game creation process.

🖼️ Image Gallery:
A complete collection featuring all the images and scenes from the game, presented in high quality.

📂 INCLUDED FORMATS:

🔹 Complete digital PDF: All 60 pages of the artbook compiled into a single document accessible from any device.
🔹 Folder with all pages in JPG format: Ideal for enjoying each individual image in high quality or creating your own personalized collection.

✨ Immerse yourself in each sketch, idea, and detail that makes DUNGEON OF LOVE special. This artbook is a visual and narrative journey through everything that makes the dungeon of love an unforgettable experience.

🌟 Make it yours and relive the most romantic adventure in visual art! 🌟

🔹 Requires the base game [DUNGEON OF LOVE: Catch Monsters] to enjoy to its fullest.

name: ARTBOOK - Dungeon Of Love
short_description: Discover the art, secrets, and magic behind DUNGEON OF LOVE in this incredible 60-page artbook.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese
